headline: Cramer Backs Sempra as LNG Expansion and $10 Billion Deal Boost Outlook
summary: Sempra (NYSE:SRE) is one of the Jim Cramer’s Recession-Proof Stock Picks. One of Jim Cramer’s favorites from earlier this year, the company has announced a final investment decision for Port Arthur LNG Phase 2 and the sale of 45% equity interest in Sempra Infrastructure. On September 22, 2025, Sempra (NYSE:SRE) announced reaching the final investment […]
